title: Ping flipping between insane and playable
body: I've been having strange ping ever since patch 5.21 jumping between 400 and 700 ping.The funny thing is Lol is the only game that I have ping higher than 200 in and the funniest thing is it hasnt been like this since the server change Rito Plz.Help Plz.

replies.body: I've only posted it here because I've tried all of Rito's ways to fix it man, I'm really bummed out cause i can't play as well as I normally would.

Hey AztecDevil2000,

It seem's like your having a problem connecting to the Client itself. You should probably try Riot's Connection KB and see if that helps with the ping spike. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

You guys/gals with the same problem should try it as well. Hope you guys get back in the game soon! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Kind of the same thing here in Seattle, but mine is rarely up at 500+ but A;WAYS at 105-107. Last week it was a steady 65. What gives?
